definition: to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: If we think about it, wind chill is an ill-defined concept.
sentences.chinese: 仔細想來，風寒是一個定義不清楚的概念。

sentences.english: Hollywood is the best if you want to come, have a good time, party,
sentences.chinese: 你要想來好好玩，聚會，好萊塢再好不過了。

sentences.english: Henry racked his brains trying to remember where he left his key.
sentences.chinese: 亨利想來想去，試圖回憶起他把鑰匙放在什麼地方了。

sentences.english: It is sad to think that the love of a mother can possess villainous aspects.
sentences.chinese: 一個慈母的愛會有它醜惡的一面，想來真使人失望。

sentences.english: I sing these songs to thank them.
sentences.chinese: 我唱這些歌想來感謝他們。

sentences.english: so I wanted to come here and have like  a really good experience.
sentences.chinese: 所以我想來這裏，能夠獲取美好的經歷。

sentences.english: Jessica was transferred from the warehouse to the accounting office, which was considered a promotion.
sentences.chinese: 傑西卡從倉庫調到了會計室，想來應該算是一種升職。

sentences.english: G: No, this time I want a cup of tonic water.
sentences.chinese: 不，這次我想來一杯湯力水。

sentences.english: The odd dealer's sharp - edged batch work submittal can be solved by a introduction of resources reservation.
sentences.chinese: 引入資源預留的思想來解決散戶的突發批量作業提交。

sentences.english: The movie makers require dream to manifest more movies;
sentences.chinese: 電影製片商需要夢想來顯化更多電影。

sentences.english: Puppet want to visit the palace, how walk, see chart below.
sentences.chinese: 想來參觀僞滿皇宮，怎麼走？請看下圖。

sentences.english: I saw your ad* in the paper and wanted to apply for the job.
sentences.chinese: 我看到你們在報紙上登的廣告想來應聘這個工作。

sentences.english: Later, he was reinstated so many people remembered him again and wanted to visit him.
sentences.chinese: 再到後來，翟公恢復了官職，很多人又想來他家拜訪。

sentences.english: We'll have a party this evening. Would you like to join us?
sentences.chinese: 今天晚上我麼有一個晚會，你想來參加嗎？

sentences.english: Werder Bremen striker Miroslav Klose has again declared an ambition to play in Italy.
sentences.chinese: 克洛澤再次表達說他想來意大利踢球的願望。

sentences.english: Come and see me whenever you want to .
sentences.chinese: 你什麼時候想來見我都可以。
